project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to manage their contacts by adding, searching, updating, and deleting entries. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and the user will interact with the application through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the feature to add a new contact
Implement the feature to search for a contact by name
Implement the feature to update an existing contact
Implement the feature to delete a contact
Implement functionality to read and write contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
